THAX2K5:
The DVD9 includes all 14 studio albums, 12 from the remastered discovery box set 2011, upmixed with DTS Neural Surround UpMix VST and Plogue Bidule SPEC 4.85 ArcTan mode.
The DSOTM and WYWH Albums are converted from he bluray flacs to DTS (Thanks to xtc343 for the source!)
The complete menu artwork and animation is made by Lupinox aka Otpoeotlh.
And also big thanks fly out to echoeshub.com for the awesome animation that i used for the intro!
At last i want to say that this project take a lot of time and i mixed the most albums 2 or 3 times before i'm satisfied with the results, i create nice modified artwork for each track and authored the complete DVD with adobe encore to this final masterpiece...
enough said, hope you all enjoy this nice DVD!
Feb, 2012

OTPOEOTLH:
I only made the dvd menu and intro, so, any question about the audio source or the upmix I have no answers.
Thax2k5 made this dvd on feb, 2012 but i think the torrent is lost there in the web,
i share now because soon i'm gonna travel and won't have internet anymore.

=============================================================================
THIS DVD only HAVE AUDIO DTS.
only playable on equipment with decoding DTS signal.
